compatibility.notes:
Saving progress from the game itself doesn't work, I have tried with all the available bases from US and EU and none of them do. When you try to save after every level the game will not freeze for a couple seconds like it would on a real GBA while saving, and instead it will just continue without creating a file
        Circumventable through the Wii U VC savestates
        This issue means if you reset the game without making a savestate your entire progress is lost
